summary: Mesh and texture swap so you can summon your biggest bro Paarthurnax into battle.
descriptionHtml:
Mesh and texture swap so you can summon your biggest bro Paarthurnax into battle.

I haven\'t been able to properly test for bugs yet. But everything seems fine summoned into combat.

Alduin has already been done - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1749

Installation: Drop the Data folder into your /skyrim/ directory.

Uninstallation: Delete extracted files that contain \'Ohda\' or \'Dragon_oh\'
author: WhoAteTheRamen
